thread.section_title: Hotel Astoria - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel, cheap prices
thread.title_full: Great hotel, cheap prices - Review of Hotel Astoria - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lennie1410
title: Great hotel, cheap prices
text: Great modern hotel. Friendly and helpful reception staff. All amenities are available in the bathroom and the mini bar is free (soft drinks + water)! Breakfast is varied. Easily accessible and close to attractions. If you would like a nice hotel not expensive, I highly recommend this hotel! Will definitely be going back there next time I'm in Paris
